医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现谷物纤维摄入量与类风湿性关节炎患病率降低之间存在显着关联研究人员调查了膳食纤维与类风湿性关节炎（RA）风险之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Study-uncovers-significant-association- Between-cereal-fibre-intake-and-reduced-rheumatoid-arthritis-prevalence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Study-uncovers-significant-association- Between-cereal-fibre-intake-and-reduced-rheumatoid-arthritis-prevalence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dfd5a82-2b56-4ec7-b49e-5a2a8d31f9a8 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 10:31:00 -0500 Study uncovers significant association between cereal fiber intake and reduced rheumatoid arthritis prevalence
研究表明，基于智能手机的商场步行计划可以增加每日步数日本的研究人员评估了基于智能手机的商场步行程序在增加每日步数方面的有效性，特别是在 COVID-19 大流行之后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Smartphone-based-mall-walking-program-could-boost-daily-step-count-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Smartphone-based-mall-walking-program-could-boost-daily-step-count-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf44208b-8ae0-4dd5-aeff-1e0cfb2c8e17 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 10:03:00 -0500 Smartphone-based mall walking program could boost daily step count, study suggests
新数据显示，1.6% 的妇女和女孩患有经前焦虑症研究人员使用确诊和临时诊断来测量经前焦虑症 (PMDD) 的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/1625-of-women-and-girls-suffer-from-premenstrual-dysphoric-disorder-new-data-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/1625-of-women-and-girls-suffer-from-premenstrual-dysphoric-disorder-new-data-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b342059-2ba9-44d4-be92-2bd5cc5aebdf Thu, 01 Feb 2024 09:36:00 -0500 1.6% of women and girls suffer from premenstrual dysphoric disorder, new data shows
研究观察到转向纯素和酮饮食的个体出现快速免疫反应研究人员评估了纯素和生酮饮食对人类免疫反应和肠道微生物群的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Study-observes-rapid-immune-response-in-individuals-switching-to-vegan-and-keto-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Study-observes-rapid-immune-response-in-individuals-switching-to-vegan-and-keto-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfbfe251-604b-45b8-94dc-a02e4fd18ba7 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 08:52:00 -0500 Study observes rapid immune response in individuals switching to vegan and keto diets
虚拟放松疗法减少临终关怀中的痛苦发表在《虚拟现实前沿》上的一项新研究探讨了名为“Flourishing-Life-Of-Wish 虚拟现实疗法”(FLOW-VRT)® 的心理策略在帮助人们应对症状并在生命临终时获得放松方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Virtual-relaxation-therapy-reduces-distress-in-end-of-life-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Virtual-relaxation-therapy-reduces-distress-in-end-of-life-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b128d377-a8f9-4026-9aa9-0d35a9d52595 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 08:28:00 -0500 Virtual relaxation therapy reduces distress in end-of-life care
CRISPR革命：新方法直接在体内编辑基因当今大多数批准的基因疗法，包括那些涉及 CRISPR-Cas9 的基因疗法，都对从体内取出的细胞发挥作用，然后将编辑后的细胞送回患者体内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/CRISPR-revolutionized-New-method-edits-genes-directly-in-the-body.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/CRISPR-revolutionized-New-method-edits-genes-directly-in-the-body.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e991e339-6d6e-4b9c-9a51-c8fa15be8a34 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 08:17:56 -0500 CRISPR revolutionized: New method edits genes directly in the body
循环胆固醇水平与败血症和危重病患者的死亡率呈负相关胆固醇稳态生物标志物与危重患者死亡率之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Circulatory-cholesterol-levels-are-inversely-linked-to-mortality-of-病人-with-sepsis-and-ritic-illness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Circulatory-cholesterol-levels-are-inversely-linked-to-mortality-of-病人-with-sepsis-and-ritic-illness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fe7b2b7-ae08-434d-a436-2efb64f10521 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 08:16:00 -0500 Circulatory cholesterol levels are inversely linked to mortality of patients with sepsis and critical illness
多囊卵巢综合症患者中年可能出现记忆和思维问题根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志 Neurology® 在线期刊 2024 年 1 月 31 日发表的新研究，患有多囊卵巢综合症的人在中年可能更容易出现记忆和思维问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/People-with-polycystic-ovary-syndrome-may-have-memory-and-thinking-problems-in-midlife.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/People-with-polycystic-ovary-syndrome-may-have-memory-and-thinking-problems-in-midlife.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8762d615-b5d5-493e-80e1-6ec70e8ade19 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 08:11:10 -0500 People with polycystic ovary syndrome may have memory and thinking problems in midlife
研究表明适度的氡气暴露与中风风险增加之间存在联系氡气是导致肺癌的第二大原因。现在，一项新研究发现，接触这种看不见、无味的气体也会增加中风的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Study-shows-link- Between-moderate-radon-exposure-and-increased-risk-of-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Study-shows-link- Between-moderate-radon-exposure-and-increased-risk-of-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e4822e4-4eaf-410c-a892-ef048d976354 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 08:07:31 -0500 Study shows link between moderate radon exposure and increased risk of stroke
新的显微镜技术揭示了脑癌组织的详细图像布里格姆和麻省理工学院的研究人员利用新型、廉价的显微镜技术发现了人类大脑组织中前所未见的细节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/New-microscopy-technology-unveils-detailed-images-of-brain-cancer-tissue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/New-microscopy-technology-unveils-detailed-images-of-brain-cancer-tissue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c1d35b4-aebd-455d-b0cf-45aecda658b0 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 07:43:45 -0500 New microscopy technology unveils detailed images of brain cancer tissue
